solution: Let $P$ be the point on the unit circle that is $240^\circ$ counterclockwise from $(1,0)$. The angle $240^\circ$ is in the third quadrant where tangent values are positive. $240^\circ = 180^\circ + 60^\circ$, and since $\tan (180^\circ + \theta) = \tan \theta$, we have $\tan 240^\circ = \tan 60^\circ = \sqrt{3}$. Thus, $\tan 240^\circ = \boxed{\sqrt{3}}$.
